DOC.brief_summary: A prospective randomized study , include moderately obese patient include . Patients randomize 3 group : - PENS dermatome T6 ambulatory self-applied patch + 1200Kcal/day diet - PENS dermatome T6 conventional procedure + 1200Kcal/day diet - Only 1200Kcal/day diet The effect appetite weight loss investigate .
DOC.brief_title: PENS T6 With Ambulatory Self-applied Patch v Conventional Procedure
DOC.detailed_description: A prospective randomized study , include moderately obese ( BMI 30-39 Kg/m2 ) patient include . Patients randomize 3 group : - PENS dermatome T6 ambulatory self-applied patch + 1200Kcal/day diet - PENS dermatome T6 conventional procedure ( weekly stimulation Outpatient Clinic ) + 1200Kcal/day diet - Only 1200Kcal/day diet The effect appetite weight loss investigate .
DOC.criteria: Moderately obese patient ( BMI 3039 kg/m2 ) Endocrinological diseases cause obesity Heart pacemaker Previous bariatric procedure
